fr.umlv.escape.ship

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.ship.Ship
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatShip, DefaultShip, FirstBoss, KamikazeShip, SecondBoss, ThirdBoss

    public abstract class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that represent a ship in the Escape Game

      • Ship

        public Ship(java.lang.String name,
    Body body,
    int health,
    Movable moveBehaviour,
    Shootable shootBehaviour)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the ship
        body - body that represent the ship in the EscapeWorld.
        health - Health of the ship.
        moveBehaviour - How the ship move.
        shootBehaviour - How the ship shoot.

    • Method Detail

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(int damage)
        Method to call when a ship have to take some damages.
        Parameters:
        damage - The amount of health the ship should lose.

        Return the health of the ship.

        Return the y position of the center of the ship.

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        Return if the ship is alive. The state not alive should represent the ship with 0 health.
        Returns:
        true if the ship is alive else false.

      • setAlive

        public void setAlive(boolean isAlive)
        Set if the ship is alive.
        Parameters:
        isAlive - State of the ship.

      • move

        public void move()
        Method that move the ship depending the last Movable set.

      • shoot

        public boolean shoot(int x,
            int y)
        Create a bullet to shoot at the position x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - Position x where to spawn the bullet.
        y - Position x where to spawn the bullet.
        Returns:
        true if the bullet has been created else false.

      • fire

        public void fire()
        launch the bullet previously created with the method shoot(int, int).
